feed.title: Thibaut Vandervelden (thvdveld)
feed.subtitle: Personal webiste of Thibaut Vandervelden! I'm a PhD researcher at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel. For my research, I'm programming in Rust and implemented the 6LoWPAN protocol in smoltcp.

entry.title: About myself
entry.content:
Welcome to my website!

Iâ€™m currently working on my PhD at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel in Belgium and started in 2019. My interests are embedded programming, especially in Rust, as well as electronics. I created this website to share my research, but also just everything else that I find interesting.

You can find more information about me at Software and Academia.
